data.text: @2hip2tweet @ZeroCovidNow1 I think it's a parody account?
@ZeroCovidNow1 Since even China seems to be abandoning #ZeroCovid will you put this account on pause for the time being? Or at least rename to ZeroCovidLater1?
@ZeroCovidNow1 It didn't break step for half term, did it? Also hospitalisations were rising while cases apparently going down... broken reporting when one does not follow the other.
@ZeroCovidNow1 Looks like what we expected for December except we got lucky that time with a less harmful variant and recent boosters in play. May well end in defacto shutdown just like March 2020. 😬
